translated: Marie Gouze, said Marie-Olympe de Gouges, born in Montauban May 7, 1748 and died guillotined in Paris November 3, 1793, was a woman of letters become politician and polemicist.
original: Marie Gouze, dite Marie-Olympe de Gouges, née à Montauban le 7 mai 1748 et morte guillotinée à Paris le 3 novembre 1793, était une femme de lettres devenue femme politique et polémiste.
